Description:
An Affordable Family Package of Flair and Flexibility!
In a tree-lined street convenient to everything Craigieburn has to offer, this freestanding home is an ideal choice for young families thanks to its versatile living spaces, impressive inclusions and impeccable surrounds.
Ready to simply move in and enjoy, the home's attractive interior comprises a generous master bedroom with its own WIR and private ensuite, along with 2 further bedrooms (both with BIRs), spotless central bathroom and separate (second) WC.
Enhancing its wow factor is a light-filled open living/dining area and adjoining lounge for added flexibility - all complemented by a stone-top kitchen with breakfast bar, tiled splashbacks and stainless steel appliances.
High ceilings throughout, the home also includes efficient LED lighting, ducted heating and split-system a/c, large laundry, sunny north-facing backyard with al-fresco entertaining area plus a remote-control garage with internal access and drive-through option.
Walking distance to Watermill Reserve, Thorngrove Reserve and Waterview Boulevard buses, it's also close to Malcolm Creek parkland and endless trails, Highlands and Craigieburn Central shopping centres, as well as easy access to Aitken Creek Primary School and Mount Ridley College.
Insights: 14 Greenham Avenue, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2020 and 245 other 3 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
LAND A GREAT FAMILY HOME IN MT AITKEN!
Positioned in the highly exclusive Mt Aitken estate, this immaculately presented family home provides space and comfort the whole family will enjoy. Situated on an expansive (520m2 approx) corner allotment with potential for side access (subject to council approval), this sizeable home features a free flowing floorplan that boasts sizeable bedroom accommodation, grand livings spaces and the epitome of cooking domains.
A well-positioned study / office to the front of the home makes an ideal work from home space, whilst the memorable master bedroom suite features a double vanity ensuite and a superbly organised walk in robe with built in shelves, drawers and double hanging space .
The dual living zones that include equipped theatre room and open plan family room are centred around the stunning kitchen domain which comprises of 900ml appliances, walk through pantry with double sink and fridge outlet. The elaborate meals area flows onto an enclosed al fresco dining space that can be utilised year round.
Other features of this attractive home include expansive backyard, security cameras, garden shed, double blinds, 2.7 ceilings, electric roller shutters, stone bench tops, ducted heating and evaporative cooling.Close to Mt Aitken Primary and Aitken Boulevard, this is a great opportunity to buy in one of Craigieburns finest locations.
*We have obtained all information in this document from sources we believe to be reliable; however, we cannot guarantee its accuracy. Prospective buyers are advised to carry out their own investigations.*

Description:
Family Flexibility on a Huge 744sqm (approx) Block!
Tucked away in a quiet yet enviably convenient cul-de-sac location, this single-level home
occupies a vast allotment providing a family lifestyle of immediate quality and comfort along with options to further enhance or possibly develop in the future (STCA).
Every room filled with natural light, the home's free-flowing interior comprises a master bedroom with WIR and private ensuite, 2 additional bedrooms (both with BIRs), main family bathroom and dedicated study (potential 4th bedroom).
Adding to its family credentials is a separate front lounge and expansive open-plan living/dining area to the rear accompanied by a well-appointed kitchen with tiled splashbacks, dishwasher, gas cooktop and a brand new dishwasher with warranty.
Other stand-out features include ducted heating and evaporative cooling, video intercom and
new window furnishings throughout, plus a simply enormous north-facing backyard and side
driveway for multiple off-street parking.
Walking distance to a choice of bus routes on Newlyn Drive and Bridgewater Road, it's also
close to local parks and Aitken Creek trails, primary and secondary schools with a 3 minute walk to a kindergarten , Craigieburn Golf Course and Craigieburn Central Shopping Centre.
Insights: 8 Medstead Court, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2020 and 245 other 3 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
Style and Comfort!
Set in an ideal and sought-after location in Craigieburn, this modern well-presented home has a lot to offer first homebuyers, investors or those looking to downsize. With a functional and flexible floorplan you will be impressed with the open plan living which provides a sense of space and comfort. Features include a fully equipped kitchen with stainless steel appliances & dishwasher overlooking the meals/living area, large master bedroom complete with ensuite, split system heating/cooling, stylish main bathroom, built in robes, a second living area or large study upstairs, double lock up garage with remote control entry and so much more. All this plus a low maintenance backyard area providing privacy and plenty of space to enjoy all year around. Ideally located in one of Craigieburn's most popular estates & tightly held streets amongst quality homes & parkland. This home really does offer a blend of low maintenance living, without comprising on space or comfort and with all the amenities close by including Craigieburn Central, public transport & schools. Be quick to inspect as this one won't hang around for long, inspection will not disappoint!!

Description:
A Charming Place to Call Home !!!
Universal Real Estate Vic proudly presents this exceptional home for growing families. Offering comfortable living that will cater to all your needs this home sets itself apart with its wonderfully versatile floor plan and impressive list of inclusions - all in a popular & convenient Trillium neighbourhood.
SPECIFICATIONS:
- BEDROOMS: Comprises good sized bedrooms (Master Bedroom boasting a large Walk-in Robe and Full Ensuite, plus 3 additional bedrooms all with Built-in Robes).
- KITCHEN: Well- Appointed kitchen with ample bench space, Stainless Steel Appliances, Dishwasher and Walk in Pantry.
-HEAT/COOL: Ducted Heating and Evaporative Cooling
- LIVING AREAS: Open Plan Kitchen, Meals and Family area.
- LAUNDRY: Massive Laundry
-BACKYARD: Full Landscaped Front and Backyard with an Alfresco for year-round entertainment.
- PARKING: Double Car Garage with Remote Control and Internal Access.
-LOCATION: A short stroll to Parklands and within close proximity to Primary Schools Hume Anglican Grammar, Child Care, Kindergarten, Public Transport, Highlands Shopping Centre, Highlands Hotel and Craigieburn Central. Move straight in and enjoy living in this magnificent pocket of Trillium and have exclusive access to the architecturally designed 'Club Trillium' leisure centre, Fully Equipped Gym, 25 metre Four Lane Swimming Pool and Children's Pool, Tennis Court, Well Equipped Function Room, Meeting Spaces and Large Entertaining Deck set in a Landscaped Park Location.
Call Gordon Garg on 0433897397 to book your Private Inspection.
METHOD:
SALE BY TENDER DATE CLOSING ON 16th JUNE 2020 @ 6 PM (unless sold prior)

Description:
DREAM HOME IN A PRIME LOCATION....
Positioned only a short stroll to all current amenities and future potential is this stunning starter or investment!! Join the Merrifield family community featuring bike trails/walking tracks, public transport, great upcoming primary-secondary schools, Merrifield shopping Centre and much more.
This home offers:
- Master Bedroom with Full En-suite | WIR
- 3 Generous Bedrooms with BIR's
- 2 Living Zone
- Dinning area
- Breathtaking Kitchen
- Walk In Pantry
- Central Bathroom
- Powder Room
- Laundry Room
- Alfresco
- Double Lock Up Garage
Luxury Extra's and Upgrades Include:
- Heating | Cooling
- Remote Garage
- Dishwasher
- Stone Bench Top
- LED Light
- High Celling
- Landscaping for Low Maintenance
- Alfresco
Call Nada Hanna on 0404 804 542 to book your inspection today. Photo ID required for all Inspections.
*Harcourts Roxburgh Park Coronavirus Update*
In light of recent events, Harcourts Roxburgh Park have taken the appropriate measures to minimise the risk of the coronavirus (COVID-19) outbreak to our staff, clients and customers. As news concerning the spread of coronavirus continues to unfold, we are no longer conducting open for inspections and kindly ask that you DO NOT attend inspections, if:
* You are feeling unwell
* Have been in contact with someone diagnosed with coronavirus
* Have been in contact with someone who has recently been overseas
* You are under strict self-isolation instructions
* You have tested positive to coronavirus yourself
If attending inspections, please ensure you practice Social Distancing (minimum 1.5 metres) at all times, keeping in mind:
* Our agents will restrict the number of people inspecting the property to one person at any time.
* You refrain from touching surfaces, door handles, cupboards, drawers, walls, etc. when inspecting the property.
We appreciate your co-operation and ask that you please respect the advice and recommendations of the agent when inspecting the property.

Description:
Adorable & Affordable!
In a blissfully quiet family-focused neighbourhood, this period style home is sure to leave a lasting impression with its generous design, immaculate presentation & central location to all of Roxburgh Park's facilities.
Beyond the facade, discover an impeccable interior comprising of 3 double bedrooms (master with walk robe & private ensuite), equally stylish main bathroom & separate WC, light-filled open living/dining area accompanied by a well-appointed kitchen with ample cupboard and bench space.
Other stand out features include; high ceilings, ducted heating, powerful split-system heating & cooling, double car accommodation and so much more!
Located to perfection directly opposite a neighbouring park (Cambridge Crescent Reserve) walking distance to local buses, close to primary & secondary schools, kindergarten/childcare, as well as easy access to shopping centres.

Description:
Indoor Style & Outdoor Space on 650m2
With its stunning renovations, free-flowing design & fabulous entertaining spaces both inside & out, this single-level masterpiece delivers a family lifestyle of uncompromised quality & class - all on a large landscaped block.
A total transformation, the home's vogue interior showcases 3 great size bedrooms (master with walk in robe), luxurious ensuite & equally-opulent main bathroom fitted with Italian porcelain tiles - both with trendy black fittings & designer tiles. Add to this a superb stone-bench kitchen with high quality cabinetry, walk in butler's pantry, marble splashback, 900ml stainless steel appliances and all complementing the spacious & light-filled open living/dining area complete with Tassie Oak timber floorboards & fireplace.
Along with gas heating & evaporative cooling, separate study, formal living area & formal dining, wonderfully wide backyard is dominated by lush lawns & outdoor fire pit plus an oversized double garage with rear work shop, additionally there is plenty of space on site for boats, trailers, caravans & extra vehicles.
In a quiet yet wonderfully convenient location & close proximity to public transport, Craigieburn Central, Medical centre, Willmott primary school & Mount Ridley College.

Description:
YOU'LL LOVE LIVING IN LAVINGTON
This home has all the space you're looking for! A great way to enter the property market and own this inviting family home with a fabulous floor plan, positioned in a tranquil court location, surrounded with an abundance of beautiful parklands with numerous walking and cycling paths with easy access to all of life's necessities, together with an abundance of quality educational facilities all within walking distance and further complimented by close proximity to shopping complexes, restaurants, recreation, sporting and business facilities.
3 bedroom home, master showcasing a fully renovated ensuite with large shower, black tapware and marble benchtop plus a walk-in robe.
The entrance opens to the combined formal lounge and dining with charming timber floors.
At the heart of the home, a well-designed kitchen with timber features, that caters perfectly overlooking the kiddies playing outside, fitted with stainless steel appliances including 900mm cooktop, wall oven plus additional integrated conventional/microwave oven, ample cupboard space, dishwasher and convenient breakfast bar/bench.
An adjoining meals area, overlooking the large living area.
Your comforts are well catered for with ducted heating, evaporative cooling, vacuum maid, modern blinds/drapes, video camera security, alarm system, solar panels and laundry with new cabinets/storage.
Double remote garage that has been optimised with the installation of a mezzanine floor, together with the advantage of an additional double entrance, leading to a large undercover entertainment area delivering a desirable built-in, gas mains BBQ, overlooking an enchanting cubby house with sandpit.
To the rear of the property is a convenient, large shed/workshop providing abundance of storage or for the "work at home" tradespeople with a coonara to keep warm and useful hot/cold water fixture alongside this.
Bus route 544 is short walk to Bridgewater Rd with additional bus routes on nearby Craigieburn Rd with 5 mins to train station.
Proudly sitting on a hefty 638m2 approx.. block of land.
24km north of Melbourne & 17km to Melb Airport with easy access to Craigieburn/Mickleham/Sydney Road as well as Craigieburn Bypass/Hume Freeway.

Description:
What An Opportunity - Brand New Family Home In Prime Location
Perfect for Investors or for first home buyers - simply move straight in and enjoy a fabulous lifestyle!!
Take advantage of Stamp Duty Savings & First Home Owners Grant
Deposit Terms: 5% of the purchase price
Leader Real Estate Agency is proud to present a brilliant opportunity to secure this modern and spacious family home, comprising of 4 bedrooms (ensuite to main), 2 bathrooms, a formal lounge and a spacious natural light-filled family living area with adjoining meals area and double garage
Entertaining has been well taken care of with sliding doors opening to a private backyard with a covered alfresco - the ideal setting for relaxing and socializing with family and friends.
Featuring:
- Blinds
- Bulk Heads
- High ceiling
- LED downlights
- Timber Entrance Door & Intercom
- Stainless steel appliances
- Extra Storage Cabinets
- Front and rear landscaping
- A Comfortable Study Nook
- Designer Facade with Wide Door Entry
- Tiles to Ceiling in all the Bathrooms
- 4 bedrooms with BIR's - (ensuite to main)
- 900mm European style stainless steel appliances
- Dishwasher & overhead cupboards in the kitchen
- 40mm caesar-stone island bench with designer kitchen
- Laminated floors to living areas & to bedrooms
- Porcelain Tiles in the wet area
- Laundry with excellent storage
- Evaporated Cooling & Ducting Heating
- Low maintenance and a relaxed lifestyle
- Double garage (remote and internal access)
- Concrete around the house including driveway & much more!!!
Well located in a friendly pocket of Mickleham's popular Estate, this comfortable and appealing home offers a convenient location, close to local shops, supermarkets and restaurants, not to mention childcare, gym and many more amenities at your fingertips.lease contact Raj Kapoor on 0466 665 613 to arrange a private viewing

Description:
STUNNING ENTERTAINER IN A FABULOUS LOCATION
Situated in Roxburgh Park's top spot with a bus stop at your doorstep and just opposite the Homestead Shopping Complex which includes a super clinic, Foodworks Supermarket, child care, St Clair Reserve and lake and Homestead Primary School. Only a short drive to Roxburgh Park Train Station, Roxburgh Park Primary School, Roxburgh College and more!
So whether you are looking for your fist home, looking to downsize or wanting to invest - this freshly renovated property is sure to impress.
Comprising of:
- Three good size bedrooms, master with fully renovated ensuite
- Large lounge with wood fire heater
- New quality kitchen with stainless steel appliances
- Adjoining meals area with room for second living
- Newly renovated laundry room
- Newly renovated bathroom with floor to walls tiles
- Ducted heating and evaporative cooling plus split system units
- Roller shutters throughout
- New top of the range floorboards throughout
- Good sized backyard, with pergola area and garden shed
- Garage with drive through access and internal access
All of the hard work has been done for the next buyer to just move in and enjoy the master piece!
INSPECTION BY APPOINTMENT ONLY

Description:
Family Focused Living with Versatile Style!
A unique cul-de-sac location in one of Roxburgh Park's most popular pockets provides the
perfect setting for this spacious 4BR residence delivering a ready-made family environment of
quality and convenience.
Every room filled with natural light, the home's flexible floorplan showcases a large master
bedroom with WIR, spa ensuite and its own undercover balcony, together with 3 additional
bedrooms (all with BIRs), main family bathroom and guest powder room (third WC).
Its family credentials are further enhanced by a spacious front lounge and versatile open-plan
living/dining area, plus a superb stone-bench kitchen complete with glass splashbacks,
Westinghouse cooking appliances and Fisher & Paykel double dishwasher.
Other stand-out features include ducted heating and evaporative cooling, full-size laundry, high ceilings, as well as a wide north-facing backyard with large undercover entertaining deck and internally-accessed double garage (remote-control).
Moments from Donald Campbell Drive buses, the area's green open spaces and endless
walking/cycling trials, it also offers easy access to primary and secondary schools, Roxburgh
Village shopping precinct and Roxburgh Park Station.
Please Note: Private inspections only.
Please contact the selling agent to make an appointment.

Description:
Light and Style with Urban Ease
Situated in a popular and convenient neighbourhood with easy access to the best of Craigieburn, this single-level home on approx. 472m2 delivers a lifestyle/investment opportunity with its generous floorplan, quality inclusions and excellent presentation throughout.
Light and bright interior features four bedrooms, neat master ensuite with WIR additional 3 bedrooms all with BIR serviced by the main bathroom and separate WC.
Add to this a formal lounge, theatre room and open lounge/dining area with well-appointed open-plan kitchen/meals, stone benchtops, stainless steel cooking appliances and dishwasher. Other highlights include ducted heating and full laundry plus sunny alfresco entertaining area and genuinely large backyard and two car garage.
Impressive convenience, it's walking distance to shops, public transport and schools, also close to cafes, restaurants, buses, parkland, local sports facilities and major shopping centres as well. Inspection is a must!
Call us today!
Shikha Vaid 0414 689 144
Simran Khatrha 0431 178 435

Description:
Live in the Heart of Highlands Estate!!!
Universal Real Estate proudly present this beautiful house in the heart of Craigieburn in most sorted Highlands Estate. On a bigger block this 4 bedroom house will impress you and your family.
Specifications:
Bedroom: 4 massive bedrooms , Massive Master Bedroom with WIR and En-suite, other 3 spacious bedroom with BIR serviced by central bathroom with Bathtub
Kitchen : Spacious Modern Kitchen with Stainless steel appliances and electric oven , ample of cupboards for storage and Dishwasher.
Living : Open plan living / dining and massive formal lounge
Heating/ Cooling : Ducted Heating and split system cooling
Laundry : Large laundry with Backyard access
Backyard : Lush green grass in backyard with concrete side yard
Garage : Double car garage with drive through access and internal access.
location :
The house is very close to Highlands Shopping Centre , Highland Hotel , Parks and other local amenities. Close proximity to Mount Ridley College , Hume Anglican Grammar, Catholic Primary School and other major schools in Craigieburn. Easy access to Mount Ridley Road and Hume Freeway.
If you're in the market for that perfect all round property then look no further than this.
Don't miss out! Call Gordon Garg - 0433 897 397.

Description:
Titled and Ready to Build!
Here is an exciting opportunity to buy this 350sqm, premium titled block of land in Mickleham's vibrant and established community of Annadale. Offering a decent dimension of 12.5m x 28m, this allotment presents a wonderful opportunity to build your dream home the way you desire.
Annadale estate is set in a location brimming with opportunity, diversity and prosperity. With a range of amenities including healthcare and education at your doorstep and a feature park already complete, this is an ideal location in a family friendly neighbourhood.
A perfect location and an ideal community to start your build journey without compromise.
Please call Sharad on 0416 404 595 for more information.

Description:
Quality Built home - FREE electricity and gas
NEVER PAY ELECTRICITY AND GAS EVER!
If PRIVACY AND SECURITY is on top of your list, than look no further.
This lovely home is thoughtfully designed for a lifestyle of sophisticated Home Luxury, complimented with the finest interior features.
The inviting porch entry leads to an impressive foyer, drawing the eye to the bright elegant formal room with beautiful window furnishings. The well-appointed kitchen features a waterfall stone island bench used at times as a convenient breakfast bar for informal dining, with plenty of counter and cabinet space, complimented with a desirable butler's pantry.
The picture perfect and deluxe living / family / dining area offering stylish touches with bulk head feature walls and comfort for your convenience.
The charming master bedroom is both elegant and warmly inviting, enhanced by a large walk-in closet, en-suite with modern vanity, lux shower with modern easy to maintain tiles. Each of the three secondary bedrooms are equally warm and welcoming and designed for stylish comfort and convenience.
In years to come, you will be glad you purchased this lovely family home nestled in the peaceful pocket of the Annadale Estate, Mickleham. Annadale is a place that makes you feel like you can escape, but at the same time find everything you need at your fingertips from the more established neighboring suburbs.
Benefit from the amenities Craigieburn offers today and the convenience of the future proposed town centre.
You will be part of a family-oriented community, surrounded with parks and walking trails, proposed schools for all ages and world class facilities and just a short drive from the Proposed new Merrifield Harbour Estate.
Additional luxury highlights include; -
Heating/Cooling
Solar Panels
Timber Laminate floor boards throughout
Marble stone bench tops
High 2.7m Ceilings throughout
Down lights Throughout
Modern light fitting in the entry
High slim doors throughout
Quality Finish on cabinetry
Landscaped front and back yard
Double car garage
Stainless steel appliances
Modern Ceiling pendants
Bamboo fencing rear yard
Timber sitting deck
Alarm system
Cameras inside and out
Call Jill Zennelli on 0447 145 867 or Sunny on 0491 219 727
